sections.heading: the controversy is subject to the Uniform Arbitration Act, any party may appeal to the district court as provided in sections 25-2728 to 25-2738
sections.text: Parties may be represented by attorneys on appeal.SourceLaws 1972, LB 1032, ยง 27;Laws 1975, LB 283, ยง 3;Laws 1980, LB 892, ยง 3;Laws 1981, LB 42, ยง 12;R.S.
